name: Flushed
description:
As a plumber, your job is to do your services at a professional level. For Albert "professional" isn't enough, he strives to deliver a pristine service and to do this he need to fight his enemys head on. In this case its to shrink yourself to a microscopic level into a toilet to fight the germs. Use Albert's unorthodox methods to crush waves of germs and finally kill 100% of his enemys.

-Controls-

WASD: Movement

LEFT MOUSE: To aim and fire projectiles

-Version Updates-

  • Version 1.0: Base game
  • Version 1.2: Score Bug fixed
  • Version 1.3: Improved fire rate, audio added, enemy spawn time increased
  • Version 1.4: Web support!!
